participant_1.background:
I'd like to talk about my beard and how it has been a part of my life.
I played a concert last night and was nervous about how my outfit would look on stage, but I ended up getting a lot of compliments!
my favorite drink is cuba libre.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.
I'm trying to get into the gambling business, like my father.

participant_2.background:
I relax by watching horror movies with my favorite snacks and enjoy my tattoos.
I love to ride my bike and get ice cream with my grandpa.
I have to study for my nursing exam this weekend, but I'm looking forward to relaxing outside with my friends after I'm finished.
I do not wish to disclose my marital status.
My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist.

content.text: Hey what's up?
Not much, just studying for my nursing exam this weekend.
Oh bummer, nursing school is tough! But I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks, I hope so!
What's your favorite part of nursing school?
I really like the clinical rotations, getting to practice my skills on real patients.
That's awesome. I'm not sure what I want to do with my life yet.
Well, you have time to figure that out. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, I played a concert last night and it was a lot of fun.
That's cool, what kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and sing, mostly classic rock.
Nice, I like classic rock too. My dad used to play guitar in a band.
That's cool, I wish I could play as well as my dad.
I'm sure you're good. Do you have any other hobbies?
Not really, I just work and play music.
Oh, that's cool. I like to ride my bike and watch horror movies.
Horror movies are awesome. What's your favorite horror movie?
I like the Conjuring series, they're really scary.
I've heard good things about those movies, I'll have to check them out.
Yeah, they're really good. I'm excited for the new one coming out soon.
Me too, I'm a big fan of the Conjuring movies.
Well, I should probably get back to studying. It was nice chatting with you!
Yeah, it was nice chatting with you too. Good luck on your exam!
Thanks
